#summary Platforms that the toolchain is known to work on.
#labels Featured,Phase-QA

=Tested platforms=

Feel free to add platforms to this list. Make sure you have successfully compiled and tested a UIKit-based application before stating that the toolchain works properly.

 * Mac OS X 10.4, Intel. An installed Tiger SDK is automatically detected, so the Xcode DMG is not necessary.
 * Ubuntu Feisty Fawn, Intel.
 * Gentoo Linux 2007.0, x86_64 (-Mike)

=Untested, but should work=

==Worked with earlier versions of the toolchain==

 * Mac OS X 10.4, PPC.
 * Mac OS X 10.5, Intel.

==Untested with any version==

 * Mac OS X 10.5, PPC.
 * Windows XP/MinGW.

=Does not build=

 * Windows XP/Cygwin: http://code.google.com/p/iphone-dev/issues/detail?id=5
